name: Starry Space Tumblr Theme (Rainbow color options)
description: This tumblr dashboard theme has background options for every color of the rainbow and comes in two versions: a space version and a supernova version. It includes gently animated post icons for every corresponding background color, four home buttons and four tumblr logo fonts. All color combinations feature a fade-as-you-scroll black transparent content box, for anyone who still has their right column options (not shown). If you want something adjusted, customized, removed, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.

style_setting_options.label: Blue Space
style_setting_options.value:
#dashboard_index,
#dashboard_edit_post,
#dashboard_submissions,
#dashboard_drafts,
#dashboard_post_queue,
#dashboard_followers,
#dashboard_members,
#dashboard_messages_inbox,
#tagged_actions_display,
#settings_actions_tumblelog,
#dashboard_useraction_followers,
#activity_actions_index,
#search_actions_search,
#dashboard_posts_likes,
#dashboard_group_members,
#dashboard_useraction_following,
.identity {
	background: url('http://i.imgur.com/ChUcOvV.png') top left #c3c3c3 repeat fixed !important;
    }
